properties.entry: SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
INSERT /*com.kh.admin.faq.model.dao.FaqDao#insertFaq()*/ INTO FAQ ( FAQ_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT ) VALUES ( SEQ_FAQNO.NEXTVAL , ? , ? )
SELECT FAQ_NO , FAQ_TITLE , FAQ_CONTENT FROM FAQ WHERE FAQ_NO = ?
UPDATE FAQ SET FAQ_TITLE = ? , FAQ_CONTENT = ? WHERE FAQ_NO = ? AND STATUS = 'Y'
UPDATE NOTICE SET STATUS ='N' WHERE NOT_NO = ?
